package.name: 11Cam Beta
package.shortDescription: iPhone 11 Camera App for older phones

descriptionlist.description: 11Cam adds the iPhone 11 Camera App to your iPhone
Compatible with iPhone XS, XS Max and XR running iOS 13.4 and above. This is a beta tweak, and things are expected to be broken

changelog.change: Confirmed to work on A12 Devices, removed portrait code
